title: Modern Infrastructure with the HashiStack
metaDescription: This is a comprehensive, engineer led course that covers building infrastructure in an IaC (Infrastructure as Code) fashion, using HashiCorp's Packer and Terraform tools.
description: This is a comprehensive, engineer led course that covers building infrastructure in an IaC (Infrastructure as Code) fashion, using HashiCorp's Packer and Terraform tools.
certification: You earn a certificate of participation by attending the course. No exam required.
language: The course is taught in English.

offers.name: Wiseman
offers.info: Booking is available at DevTernity website
